Name: my_email*
Description: Email address specified when posting a comment.

Name: my_location*
Description: Location specified when posting a comment.

Name: my_name*
Description: Name specified when posting a comment.

Name: my_url*
Description: URL specified when posting a comment.

Name: notify_me
Description: If set to ‘yes’, notifications will be sent to the saved email address when new comments are made.

Name: save_info
Description: If set to ‘yes’, allows additional cookies to store guest user information for use when filling out comment forms. This cookie is only set if you submit a comment.
